name: Binary Breach
description:
How to play: A binary number will fall from the top of the screen, which you must convert into denary/decimal and type in using the keyboard. Every time you get a number wrong, you get closer to being caught.

"We think the Government's hiding something big. Your mission is to hack into their systems and find out exactly what it is they're hiding, and why. You're the best hacker we've got. Good luck."

Basic knowledge of binary is needed to fully enjoy this game.

This game is a submission to the Weekly Game Jam 138, with the theme "Hack"
